Usage¶

How to install¶

1. Activate conda environment¶

$ conda create -n coolenv python=3.8
$ conda activate coolenv

2. Install farabio¶

  1. With pip:

$ pip install farabio

  1. Setup from source:

$ python -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools wheel  # ensure up-to-date
$ pip install [-e] . -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/torch_stable.html  # flag for editable mode

Prerequisites¶

docutils==0.17.1,
jupyterlab==3.1.6,
matplotlib==3.4.3,
numpy==1.21.1,
pandas==1.3.1,
scikit-image==0.18.2,
scikit-learn==0.24.2,
torch==1.9.0+cu111,
torchvision==0.10.0+cu111,
torchaudio==0.9.0
